As it was my first time booking a massage treatment at Zen Moment Boutique I didn't knew what to expect. The service is to the point. A description is being offered in advance of the treatment and I've been pampered and feel renewed & relaxed. My back feels so much better after receiving a detailed and precise massage that left me feel amazing. Worth to come back!

Sandro is simply amazing😍! I had many muscle knots due to stress and anxiety, because of that I had a lot of pain in my back and neck. Sandro helped me very good! I have 2 more sessions to go to get rid of all my muscle knots, but after my first session I feel very relieved and relaxed already, my neck doesn’t hurt like it used to before and my back pain is not tiring me anymore. I would definitely recommend to get a massage done by Sandro. Taking care of your body is the best thing you can do, especially for your muscles. Feeling totally different and that makes me happy!😃👍🏽
